about_the_game:
The Rogue Lords Original Soundtrack immerses you in the game's unique world.
When composing each track, Laurent Courbier worked closely with the development teams to perfectly capture the world and action of the game. Start your journey in the New World with 18 devilishly good and original tracks.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains minimal blood, mild violence, mature and suggestive themes, alcohol reference, and infrequent use of strong language.

detailed_description:
The Rogue Lords Original Soundtrack immerses you in the game's unique world.
When composing each track, Laurent Courbier worked closely with the development teams to perfectly capture the world and action of the game. Start your journey in the New World with 18 devilishly good and original tracks.
legal_notice: Rogue Lords ©2021 Published by Nacon and developed by Cyanide Studio and Leikir Studio. All rights reserved.
name: Rogue Lords - Original Soundtrack

dejus.descriptors:
Violência fantasiosa

short_description: Immerse yourself in the atmospheric world of Rogue Lords with the Original Soundtrack, which includes 18 tracks composed specially for the game.
